v0: This reminder of a large scale impact event marks the surrounding landscape.
v1: 这种大规模撞击事件的改变了周边的地貌。

v0: A vast and ancient network of underground mines, vaults and production facilities stretching over the whole planet.
v1: 一个由地下矿井、仓库和生产设施组成的庞大而古老的网络，遍布整个行星。

v0:
In the Depts of the underground network of [root.GetName] we have found a storage of extraordinary material. At first it seemed to be some sort of metal alloy but it possess properties none of our scientists can explain. It somehow repairs damage to its structure by itself.

 Having access to such a material may open up possibilities we did not dare to think about before. With it we might even be able to reconstruct the destroyed planetary ring structure that orbits [root.GetName]. In fact it must have been a prerequisite for its construction in the first place.
v1: 在 [root.GetName] 地下网络的中，我们发现了某种奇异材料的储藏室。表面看起来它似乎是某种金属合金，但它具有我们的科学家无法解释的特性 —— 它似乎在以某种方式进行自我修复其结构的损坏。 研究这样的材料可能会开启我们以前不敢想象的可能性，有了它我们甚至可以重建环绕 [root.GetName] 运行的损坏的星环结构。

v0: We all eagerly await its finish.
v1: 我们都在热切地期待着。

v0: Our scientists have finished their study on the remains of the ringworld and the "Living metal" as they call it. Work on its restoration can now start.
v1: 我们的科学家已经完成了对环形世界遗迹的挖掘和他们所说的“活金属”的研究，修复工作现在可以开始。

v0: It is ours now and forever!
v1: 从现在到永恒，它都是我们的！

v0: The work is completed and [root.GetName] is now fully restored to its former Glory. It is a great they for the [root.owner.GetName]. Citizens are celebrating all over the empire. May we never loose [root.GetName] again.
v1: 工作已经完成，[root.GetName] 现在已经重现了往日的辉煌。他们对 [root.owner.GetName] 来说真是太棒了。帝国各地的公民都在庆祝。愿我们再也不会失去[root.GetName]。

v0:
We have reached the legendary "Hall of Durin". Our Scientists did not expect to find anything special there. But when first system scans reached them they were struck speechless. There is one planet orbiting its sun inside the habitable zone.

And there is more! It seems to be orbited by some kind of mega structure. We should investigate it as soon as possible.
v1: 我们已经到达了传说中的“都林圣殿”。我们的科学家没有期待会在那里发现什么特别的东西。但当第一次星系扫描结果送到他们手中时，他们却惊得说不出话来。有一颗行星在宜居带内绕恒星运行。而且读数显示，它似乎被某种运行中的巨型结构围绕着。我们应该尽快调查此事。

v0: We need to find out more.

A heavily damaged gigantic ring orbits a planet covered in dense clouds. High radiation values are measured by our probes. Our scientists already supected what became a certainty when our scienceship found a small object orbiting the planet. It turned out to be an ancient lifepod - in it the remains of its unfortunate passenger - apparently [root.owner.species.GetAdj].

 In ancient times Durin lead our people away from their home when a great disaster struck it. It was a long exodus beneath the stars until they found their new home. Though we always believed this ancient home to be somewhere on Erebor, lost to the ages, this must be Khazad Dum our ancient home.
v1: 一个严重受损的星环围绕着一颗被浓密云层覆盖的行星运行，我们的探测器读数显示地表上有着强烈的辐射。我们的科学船在行星轨道上发现了一个小物体，事实证明，这是一个古老的休眠舱 —— 里面有一名不幸的乘客的遗骸 —— 显然是[root.owner.species.GetAdj]。 远古时期，当一场大灾难降临时，都林带领我们的人民离开了家园。他们在星空下经历了一段漫长的逃亡，直到找到新的家园。虽然我们一直相信这个古老的家园位于埃雷博尔的某个地方，但已经失落于岁月之中，但这一定是我们的祖先的家园 —— 卡扎德杜姆。

v0:
Our scientists came up with plans how to counter the threats our expedition will be faced with. Though it will not be very pleasant our personnel will have to wear heavy protective gear at all time when beeing outside their shielded habitat modules. All these protection measures will also increase production times and costs for any building constructed. A suitable landing place where Radiation levels are within acceptable limits has been found as well.

It is time to establish an expeditionary outpost on Khazad Dum. We still do not know what happened to our ancestors. What might have destroyed their world, laid their cities to ruins and brought their civilisation to collapse?
v1: 我们的科学家提出了一个计划以帮助我们的探险队应对即将面临的威胁。尽管这不会很令人愉快，但我们的人员在防护基地外时必须始终穿着重型防护装备。所有这些保护措施还将增加建筑的建造时间和成本。另外科学家们还找到了辐射水平在可接受范围内的合适着陆点。 现在是在卡扎德杜姆建立远征前哨的时候了。我们仍然不知道我们的祖先发生了什么。是什么摧毁了他们的世界、使他们的城市成为废墟、使他们的文明崩溃？

v0: With our outpost established, it is time to begin the planned expeditions into the old ruins. We´ll also have to clear any obstacles that prevent our teams' movement along the way.
v1: 我们已经建立了前哨基地，是时候开始计划对古老废墟的探险了，任何阻碍我们进一步探险的障碍都将被清除。

v0: Prepare an expedition into the deeps.
v1: 准备一次深入地下的探险。

v0: The last excavation area held an extraordinary secret. Our team has found a giant gateway to an underground network. At the moment we can only guess how far it stretches.
v1: 最后的发掘区域隐藏着一个非凡的秘密。我们的团队发现了通往地下网络的巨大入口，到目前未知我们只能猜测它延伸了多远。

v0: Send our forces to save them!
v1: 派出我们的军队来拯救他们！

v0: Our expedition of the mine has gone horribly awry, a horde of undescribable horrors seem to have awakened and slaughtered our expedition team. They have now begun pouring out of the gateway and are preparing to launch a full scale assault on our outpost.
v1: 我们的地下探险队出了岔子，一群难以形容的恐怖实体似乎被唤醒了，它们屠杀了我们的探险队并且开始从大门涌出，准备对我们的前哨基地发动全面攻击。

v0: For a long time have the stars been a central part of our legends and what would be a more fitting start of our journey into the unknown than Durin's Folk visiting the most important star of our legends, the "Hall of Durin".
v1: 星空一直以来都是自上古时代流传下来的传说中的核心，那么就让我们从拜访传说中的“都林圣殿”开始这场探索未知的旅程。

v0:
The Durin's Forge system is a trinary star system with a few planets and many asteroids.

Homeworld - Size 16-20

3 Suns, 1 Molten Worlds, 1 Gas Giant, 1 Frozen World, 12 Asteroids

This version has no quest.

$system_initializer_DESC$
v1: 都林熔炉星系是一个三星系统，拥有少量行星和许多小行星。包含一个16-20大小的母星、3 个太阳、1 个熔火世界、1 个气态巨行星、1 个冰冻世界、12 个小行星。此版本没有任务。 $system_initializer_DESC$

Homeworld - Size 16-20

3 Suns, 1 Molten Worlds, 1 Gas Giant, 1 Frozen World, 12 Asteroids

This version has a quest.
